extensionDescription.message: Password generator that generates passwords with varying lengths and complexity

buttonAction.message: Click here to generate a password $LENGTH$ characters long, using $SET$ characters
buttonAction.description: Tells the user what each button does

poolTitle.message: The characters used to create the password, you can add or remove characters

rangeTitle.message: The length of the generated password, you can click or drag to change

outTitle.message: The generated password. You can edit the password before copying it

copyTitle.message: Copy the advanced generated password to the clipboard
